_comments.large_header: Toggles the size of the top banner.
_comments.show_in_navigation: Toggles a link in the top banner.
_comments.authorStaffMember: The staff member writing this post.
_comments.call_to_action: Type of request shown at the bottom of this page.
_comments.background_image_path: Image shown in the top banner, blank for the default.
_comments.map: Update the map location and display settings.
_comments.latitude: Coordinates for the center marker on the map.
_comments.longitude: Coordinates for the center marker on the map.
_comments.zoom: The zoom level for the map.
_comments.phone_extension: The digits after dialing the company phone.
_comments.credentials: Shown as subtext on staff member summaries.
_comments.contact_email_address: Address for the contact form to send to.
_comments.new_window: Whether the link opens a new browser tab/window.
